ovdesc.p: Stores the list of WR.KYR.INFO id's that belongs to different report books present in WR.REPORT.BOOK application.
Updated while authorizing the WR.KYR.INFO record for respective report book.

desc.p: Specifies the Id of WR.KYR.INFO record.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
